        Plan your visit
      From the Director: Welcome to a new year at SJMA...

      See what you think.

      Hours

      Museum + Store

      Thursday: 4–9pm
      Friday: 11am–9pm
      Saturday–Sunday: 11am–6pm

      Museum Café

      Thursday: 4–9pm
      Friday: 11am–9pm
      Saturday–Sunday: 11am–3pm

      Admission

      Tickets

      • Adult, $20
      • Senior 65 and over, $15

      Free Individual Tickets

      • Youth 17 and under
      • College student + teacher with ID

      Bringing a group of 10 or more?
      – Book a private group visit 
      – Book a college group visit

      Free Unlimited Visits

      • Museum members

      Our members receive FREE unlimited entry for a year, plus much more—Join us today!

      Location

      110 South Market Street
      San José, CA 95113
